content.body: bakkot: Seems somewhat reasonable, although I'd be especially happy if someone could do the analysis for all similar web platform methods. I think that would be: byobStreamReader.read(), textEncoder.encodeInto(), maybe crypto.getRandomValues()?
content.formatted_body: bakkot: Seems somewhat reasonable, although I'd be especially happy if someone could do the analysis for all similar web platform methods. I think that would be: byobStreamReader.read(), textEncoder.encodeInto(), maybe crypto.getRandomValues()?

content.body: zcorpan: well, I think if we rewrote that to use "constructor steps" we'd use the relevant settings object of this, but you're correct that it'll be 1:1 with the current settings object
